data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Chaiyaphum, Thailand who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chaiyaphum, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Chaiyaphum, Thailand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Chaiyaphum, Thailand that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Chaiyaphum, Thailand and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Lao Phuan people.
Father, remind your church in Chaiyaphum, Thailand that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Chaiyaphum who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Chaiyaphum that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

location.name: Chaiyaphum
location.cities_list: Chaiyaphum, Kaeng Khro, Phu Khiao, Kaset Sombun, Bamnet Narong
location.cities_list_w_pop: Chaiyaphum (58,350), Kaeng Khro (29,056), Phu Khiao (17,122), Kaset Sombun (16,996), Bamnet Narong (14,890)
